internal.para: Size of cache flags and any other prefix data in each sxa_cached_* struct. Each struct must have same prefix data. Only the final 'value' field may be different.

memberdef.name: _SXA_CACHED_STRING
memberdef.initializer: PACKED_STRUCT { sxa_cache_flags_t flags; uint8_t value[len+1]; } name

briefdescription.para: Cached string register value.

detaileddescription.para: This is in the form of a macro which generates an in-line struct definition, since strings are arrays with generally different maximum lengths.
One extra char is automatically added, for the null terminator.

memberdef.name: _SXA_CACHED_BIN
memberdef.initializer: PACKED_STRUCT { sxa_cache_flags_t flags; uint8_t value[len]; } name

briefdescription.para: Cached binary register value.

detaileddescription.para: This is in the form of a macro which generates an in-line struct definition, since binaries are arrays with generally different maximum lengths.

briefdescription.para: Cached register value handling: maximum number of queued updates.
Macro for registering a handler to receive node announcements via both ATND responses and 0x95 frames received.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the XBEE_FRAME_NODE_ID (0x95) handler is only necessary when ATAO=0. When ATAO is not zero, the 0x95 frames come in as 0x91 frames on the Digi Data Endpoint.

memberdef.name: XBEE_FRAME_HANDLE_IS_RESPONSE

briefdescription.para: Macro for registering a handler to receive I/O samples via both ATIS responses and 0x92 frames received.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the XBEE_FRAME_IO_RESPONSE (0x92) handler is only necessary when ATAO=0. When ATAO is not zero, the 0x92 frames come in as 0x91 frames on the Digi Data Endpoint.

internal.para: Cached register value status: value unknown (never read)
Cached register value status: value read successfully from device
Cached register value status: value could not be read from device
Cached register value status: value is being read from device
Cached register value status: value is pending a radio query
Cached register value status: not a valid cache group

briefdescription.para: Dummy for when no caching required.
Got .id.node_id (normally obtained by initial discovery, however app can explicitly refresh if desired).
I/O configuration: ATD0 etc., in .io field.
Device information: HV, VR and DD.
Dest addr: DH,DL.

detaileddescription.para: This is a group since it is exceptional in requiring two commands to get a single (logical) 64 bit value.

briefdescription.para: Miscellaneous stuff (one of the sxa_cached_* sub-structures) - these have their own individual cache status flags.

detaileddescription.para: This should be the last entry, and not have an entry in the group table. Miscellaneous entries have their cache status flag immediately before the binary data, and thus do not need a group table entry.

briefdescription.para: This enum gives numeric identification to all cache groups.

internal.para: Flag data for register value cache status

For this library to work, structure packing must be enabled (accomplished using the PACKED_STRUCT macro). This is because the size of the actual data must be derivable from the size of the containing structure, minus the size of the following flags field.
The flags field takes on one of the _SXA_CACHED_OK etc. values.

briefdescription.para: Cached generic register value (no data)
Cached value.
